about_the_game:
This free patch adds 18+ content to All Ashes and Illusions, including:

  • Six uncensored sex scenes
  • Eight new CGs
  • Uncensors three existing CGs
  • About 15,000 words of new text

Requires the base game, All Ashes and Illusions, to download.

content_descriptors.notes:
This DLC adds six uncensored sex scenes in the story, which are scattered across the narrative, and uncensors a handful of existing CGs, so more skin is on display.
Note: All the sexual content in this VN is of dubious/coercive consent, given the large power imbalance present between the main characters. This content may upset some readers, so please think carefully before downloading it.

Requires the base game, All Ashes and Illusions, to download.

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: x86/x86_64
  • Processor: 1 Gz
  • Memory: 512 MB RAM
  • Graphics: DirectX or OpenGL compatible card
  • Storage: 60 MB available space
  • Sound Card: Any audio output
